name: Laser Cat
description:
Oh no! The cat galaxy has been overrun by dogs and vacuums. Fluffy puff, the cat, has a special ability that can shoot lasers out of her eyes and can defeat these outsiders. Fluffy puff is on a mission to extinguish all these dogs and vacuums with her laser and bring back peace to the cat galaxy.

There is a total of four rounds, each round will have different enemies and each one harder to beat as the level progress. The cat has three lives, but in each level, there are power-ups for health. If the cat loses all the lives, the game is over. If the cat can beat the last level without dying, the cat finally saves the day.
